Instance.description: Class for umbrella picker. We need this because we need a way to tell UI which umbrella is picked.
Instance.parents: ObjectDefinitionPickerInteraction, ObjectPickerInteraction, PickerSingleChoiceSuperInteraction, PickerSuperInteraction, ImmediateSuperInteraction, SuperInteraction, Interaction

Tunable.name: disabled_toolip
Tunable.description: Tooltip that displays if the sim currently has the trait in the mapping.

TunableList.name: trait_to_definition_id
TunableList.description: Backward mapping of trait to what umbrella the sim carries

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The object must have this definition.
